messages.subject: New to You
messages.msgSnippet: Hello, My name is Kathryn and I have only recently signed up on e-groups. Please excuse any ignorance on my behalf! Just wanted to introduce myself - I have
messages.messageBody:
Hello,

My name is Kathryn and I have only recently signed up on e-groups.
Please excuse any ignorance on my behalf!

Just wanted to introduce myself - I have two children. Mia is 5 and
Jude is 2. Baby expected late January. We are located, Melbourne,
Australia - don't suppose there are any locals out there???

I understand my children are not 'school age' anyway, but I certainly
am going to need support as at next year! I'm sure there will (and
already is!) a lot of questions being fired at me about why/how/,
etc. . . truth is, the 'natural learning' approach is the only thing I
am sure of!!

Love to get peoples experiences with radical unschooling. Just to have
stories shared. It's going to take a little time for me to embrace
TV/junk food . . . the philosophy behind it all I COMPLETELY
understand. It's my ever so deep conditioning holding me back . . .
baby steps . . .
